title: How fair is the jury system?
creator_credit: George Cass, Victoria. Ministry of Education and Jeff Spencer
brief_description: An audience of students questions a prominent barrister on the fairness of the jury system. The program considers such issues as choosing a jury, eligibility of jurors and alternatives or reforms of the jury sustem.
